What is HEROES Academy?

We are an organization dedicated to enriching the minds of advanced students. Among the many other classes offered, HEROES provides Computer Science courses for a range of curriculum, from mastering Minecraft with Python to an introductory course on Artificial Intelligence in games.

Current Courses

Winter 2016

  • Introduction to Python
  • Data Structures
  • Introduction to Artificial Intelligence: Agents and Games

Upcoming Courses

Spring 2016

  • Mastering Minecraft with Python (not live yet)

Summer 2016

  • Introduction to Python

Fall 2016

  • TBA
